title: Safari windows debugging symbols
content: Apple developer network site has a small guide about setting up debugging symbols server for Safari browser on Windows. But it doesn't work. First, the link to actual symbols server gets redirected from http to https, but then it just 404s. Now, I know that Safari isn't supported on Windows any longer, but I wanted to play with existing version. Any idea if the symbols are actually available somewhere?

answers_data.content:
Your best bet is to contact Adam Roben directly for the symbol files. He seems to be the person who put these out 5 years ago.

You can find his email and some more information regarding symbol server at the following links. http://trac.webkit.org/changeset/35512
https://lists.webkit.org/pipermail/webkit-dev/2008-August/004741.html
http://mac-os-forge.2317878.n4.nabble.com/Safari-for-Windows-symbol-server-updated-td177872.html

comments.text: yes, i guess that is my best chance as i doubt anybody else god them , thank you!
